siteMetadata.title: Maggie Appleton
siteMetadata.description: Maggie Appleton is an art director and anthropological designer. This is her digital garden for growing visual explanations about technology, culture, and programming

brainNote.title: A Chat with Henry Zhu on OSS & Gift Economies

frontmatter.title: A Chat with Henry Zhu on OSS & Gift Economies

childMdx.excerpt: A gift economy is a  system of exchange  based on gift giving. Valuables are given without explicit agreement of future rewards between individuals, or within a contained community of people. Gift economies have a few key qualities. They are... Loosely and informally tracked…

If you've build anything on the modern web, you've used  Babel .   Nothing works without it. When I first started learning web development I didn't pay much attention to it. But once I got deeper into learning  JSX  and React (more on that in my  React is a Potato  talk) and  I…
After learning about  Babel , I stumbled into the "is Babel a compiler or a transpiler?" debate. To help clarify things, I did a little research and illustrated it.
